related_post.text: I created a Tkinter gui that generates a random number But I need help to not duplicate the same number again and again. Would anyone help me? Here is my pick command to generate a random number```csdef pick(): for _ in range(1): y = random.randint(1,15)  lucky = tk.Label(root text=(y) font=('Helvetica'),) lucky.pack()```

comments: direct a to q regarding gneerating random numbers
